Where to look

  • Jaeger UI: http://localhost:16686 (service: delineate-hackathon-challenge)
  • Sentry: set VITE_SENTRY_DSN and SENTRY_DSN, then trigger a Sentry test above.
  • Trace export: set VITE_OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT to your collector (defaults to Jaeger OTLP).
